abstract: Analysts said the central bank’s reluctance to take action that might compromise its independence has been seen as indecision.
snippet: Analysts said the central bank’s reluctance to take action that might compromise its independence has been seen as indecision.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — The euro stops with the European Central Bank — or does it?

headline.main: Doubts on European Central Bank Amid Crisis
headline.print_headline: Doubts Grow on Central Bank’s Ability to End Crisis

abstract: Bank of America, Deutsche Bank and Citigroup are three big name banks active in the field of end-of-quarter “window dressing,” that is masking risk by temporarily ridding debt before they make their finances public, a recent analysis for The Wall Street Journal shows.

lead_paragraph: Bank of America, Deutsche Bank and Citigroup are three big-name banks active in end-of-quarter “window dressing” — that is, masking risk by temporarily shedding debt before they make their finances public — a recent analysis for The Wall Street Journal shows.

headline.main: Report Says BofA, Deutsche and Citi Blur Risks
